channel.title: Spike Bros
channel.description:
# Spike Bros
![video|500x500](upload://lTvqz1EyrePCCyxj6HKSBrnEXzh.gif)
>In 1995, the Cactus Space Agency, launched 10000 cactus into space as an experiment. Little would they know, radiations transformed them into weird creatures. Spike Bros is an art NFT consisting of 10000 randomly generated space cacti. **Price of each NFT:** 40 XRD or equivalent in DGC **Links:** * [Website](http://spikebrosnft.com/) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/spike_bros_xrd) * [Telegram](http://t.me/spike_bros)

item.title: Spike Bros
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
GIVEAWAY TIME
We are doing another NFT giveaway. This time, the 3 winners will be chosen from the first 100 members of our Telegram: Telegram: Contact @spike_bros. All you have to do is join the Spike Bros telegram.
Winners will be selected when we reach 100 members.
Good luck!

As of now, there are currently 43 members in the Telegram group. Best hurry up!
